title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat, and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async APIs, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker, conversation history, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion via Ollama using the official GitHub Copilot UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models from BPMN service tasks for human-like decisions.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM provider module letting you call Ollama through a unified OpenAI-style endpoint with fallbacks and cost tracking.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-stage Dockerfile and docker-compose examples for CPU & CUDA images; includes OpenAI-compatible labels.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal RAG question-answering demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats in channels or threads using any Ollama model with slash-command permissions.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Merged Nix flake adding Ollama to nixpkgs; build from source or install binary cache on macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async wrappers over the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat, generate, and pull models from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-r
summary: Official R client for Ollama; thin wrapper around httr2 with S3 objects for chat and embeddings.
